description: Cozy 1 bedroom city escape. My place is close to Central Park, 59th St subway station (4,5,6,N,Q,R),Dylan's Candy Bar, Serendipity 3, Baked by Melissa's, Duane Reede, Sprinkles. You’ll love my place because of Great Location!!. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Cozy Upper East Side Home Away from Home
review: The place was located in the heart of the city and very comfortable for 3 guests. Shivani had provided us the air mattress for 3rd guest. I would recommend to stay at the apartment.
